Use a cloud-based service: If you have access to a cloud-based service, you could use it to store and access your files, complete assignments, or communicate with others.
Use a physical notebook: If you have a physical notebook, you could use it to take notes, brainstorm ideas, or complete assignments.
Use a pen and paper: If you have a pen and paper, you could use them to take notes, brainstorm ideas, or complete assignments.
Use a library or study area: If you have access to a library or study area, you could use it to access resources, complete assignments, or communicate with others.
Use a different computer: If you have access to a different computer, you could use it to access important files, complete assignments, or communicate with colleagues or classmates.
